sentence.Network_en: This Greek diplomatist pretends he cannot speak nor understand English.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个希腊外交家假装听不懂也不会讲英文.

sentence.Network_en: Printer , editor, inventor, scientist, diplomatist : whatever the part , he seemed at ease in it.
sentence.Network_cn: 出版家, 编辑, 发明家, 科学家, 外交家,不管做什么, 他几乎无所不能.

sentence.Network_en: He was not only a magistrate, he was almost a diplomatist.
sentence.Network_cn: 维尔福先生不仅是位法官, 而且几乎是位外交家.
